title: Topic 001 Question 061
body: You have a kiosk that displays a Power BI report page. The report uses a dataset that uses Import storage mode.
You need to ensure that the report page updates all the visuals every 30 minutes.
Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Configure the data sources to use DirectQuery.
Add a Microsoft Power Automate visual to the report page.
Configure the data sources to use a streaming dataset.
